channel.title: 爱情 on Fu Bin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in 爱情 on Fu Bin's Blog

item.title: 《本杰明·巴顿奇事》
item.description: – Some days I feel different than the day before. – Everybody feels different about themselves, one way or another. But we all going the same way. Just taking different roads to get there, that’s all. You’re on your own road, Benjamin Never know what’s coming for you. The Lord giveth and the Lord taketh away. – I’d never thought about life or death that way before .
